attributes.action: Disband O F G E M and nationalise the power companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the consumer has been made to pay high energy bills on the back of power companies and their share holders gaining large profits.this should be stopped now,and o f g e m should be disbanded to save the tax payer millions of pounds for a watchdog with no bite.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
